scripts.start1: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node production/index.js
scripts.start:heroku: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run db-migrate && npm run db-seed-dev && babel-node ./src/index.js
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=testing npm run db-undo-migration && NODE_ENV=testing npm run db-migrate && NODE_ENV=testing nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --require @babel/register src/tests/*.js  --require @babel/polyfill --require @babel/register --timeout 100000000 --exit
scripts.pretest-travis: NODE_ENV=testing npm run db-undo-migration && NODE_ENV=testing  npm run db-migrate
scripts.db-seed-test: NODE_ENV=testing npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all && NODE_ENV=testing sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db-seed-dev: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all && npx sequelize db:seed:all
